Draft Rating:

C+

Kevin Pritchard ranks in the 56th percentile for drafting among executives in our database. That's basically average. It could worse though lol.
Some of their biggest wins:
  • Drafted Cassius Stanley with 54th pick but was worth 27th pick.
  • Drafted Armon Johnson with 34th pick but was worth 26th pick.
Some of their biggest busts:
  • Drafted Dante Cunningham with 33th pick but was worth 50th pick.
  • Drafted Aaron Holiday with 23th pick but was worth 52th pick.
  • Drafted Bennedict Mathurin with 6th pick but was worth 46th pick.

Trade Rating:

C

Kevin Pritchard ranks in the 52th percentile for trading among executives in our database. That's basically average. It could be worse though lol.
Their biggest win:
  • Added Nicolas Batum to POR.
  • Lost Darrell Arthur to MEM.
  • Lost Joey Dorsey to HOU.
Their biggest L:
  • Added Malik Fitts, Juwan Morgan, Aaron Nesmith, Nik Stauskas, Daniel Theis, Julian Strawther to IND.
  • Lost Malcolm Brogdon to BOS.
